Text:
Thank you very much. I am running out of space at the moment, and this series is a must.
I will keep seeding for a while.

I am happy you appreciate it. I, too, have a limited HD and cannot possibly stock all of these wonderful TTC lectures. I really watch about 10 at times in a day !! I really hope others will also compress other collections. 350MB for a 30min video is too much.
